name: Crate Avalanche!
description:
Your goal is to avoid all falling objects, but you have limited moves!

Every 10 seconds you'll be given five extra touches making you able to move, but if you ran out of moves, you won't be able to swap the character direction, so be careful.

  • Avoid be crushed by all the falling crates
  • Think the right moment to use a touch
  • This is my first game, so have fun playing it!

Also, Crate Avalanche is an endless game, so you don't have to worry about limited time to beat your highscore!

Mobile gameplay:

The game works a little differently on mobile devices. To swap to the left you have to hold your finger onto the screen, to swap to the right you have to release your finger.

Currently I'm working to solve this problem and make the gameplay similar on both devices (Mobile and PC), stay tuned!
